summary:
Chartered Accountant and Cost and Management Accountant, with the exposure of working in various areas of finance function and being able to apply myself to diversified responsibilities. Having worked in one of the leading multinational FMCG company and for one of the most reputable accountancy/audit firm of the country, I’ve gained the understanding of the accounting and internal control systems implemented in various organisations and being able to work in the teams involving personnel from various functions.

Specialties: Financial Accounting and Reporting according to the requirements of International Financial Reporting Standards (IFRSs)
-Management Reporting and Financial Analysis
-Budgeting, Planning and Forecasting
-Evaluation of internal controls and processes
-Implementation of financial systems

profile_positions.title: Global Supply Performance Controller
Regional Supply Finance Controller and Productivity Lead - AMET

profile_positions.description:
Leading the finance function of the factory & ensuring key Supply Finance KPI’s of factory are delivered and adequate internal controls are in place. 
This role involves regular interaction with Regional Manufacturing Director, Procurement Director and Supply Chain Managers.
Other primary responsibilities include compiling annual plan and forecasts for the factory. Carrying out variance analysis, new product costing, cost-benefit reviews, tracking project costs and savings, validating capital expenditure requests, setting-up internal control systems and processes, month-end reporting, conversion cost analysis. 
Guiding the finance team in factory in performing their tasks and preparing them to take higher responsibilities.
profile_positions.title: Financial Controller

profile_positions.description:
Currently working in the capacity of Finance Manager, My key responsibilities include :

•	Manage and Supervise Accounts payable, Accounts Receivable and Treasury team
•	Manage and monitor Net Working Capital of the Company
•	Manage Credit Policy in line with guidance given by the group and ensure recovery of Accounts Receivable on time
•	Custodian of company’s policies and procedures and keeping constant eye on compliance
•	Control and monitor fixed costs
